Uses of Class
gov.niarl.his.privacyca.TpmIdentityProof

  • Packages that use TpmIdentityProof 
    Package Description
    gov.niarl.his.privacyca
    This package contains all base classes that are used by the HIS Privacy CA and Client Provisioner.

    • Uses of TpmIdentityProof in gov.niarl.his.privacyca

      TpmIdentityProof TpmIdentityRequest.decrypt(RSAPrivateKey privCaKey)
      Decrypt the identity request to get the identity proof.

      Creates a new X509 V3 certificate for use as an Attestation Identity Key (AIK) using the BouncyCastle provider.
